      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void SourceIndexerFactory.filesDeleted(Iterable<? extends Indexable> deleted, Context context)
      Called by indexing infrastructure to allow indexer to clean indexes for deleted files.
      abstract void SourceIndexerFactory.filesDirty(Iterable<? extends Indexable> dirty, Context context)
      Called by indexing infrastructure to notify indexer that a file was modified and so its index may contain stale data.

      Indexes given set of files.
